definition: to drink a toast/Cheers! (proposing a toast)/Here's to you!/Bottoms up!/lit. dry cup
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: Everywhere I went I had to toast and drink with the people there, and after a few rounds I felt a little tipsy.
sentences.chinese: 每到一處均要跟人乾杯，酒過三巡，我已經有些醉意。

sentences.english: Let us all now drink a toast to the future success of the company.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們大家一起來乾杯，祝公司未來鴻圖大展。

sentences.english: People at a stable will usually “Gan Bei” when toasting each other.
sentences.chinese: 人們往往以“乾杯”的方式互相敬酒。

sentences.english: Drink toasts of love and commitment.
sentences.chinese: 爲相愛和海誓山盟而乾杯。

sentences.english: He proposed a toast to both the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.chinese: 他提議爲新娘和新郎乾杯。

sentences.english: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you the President!
sentences.chinese: 女士們，先生們，我提議爲總統乾杯。

sentences.english: We drank a toast to the Alto.
I propose a toast to the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 我提議爲兩國人民的友誼乾杯。

sentences.english: May I have your attention, please?I’d like to propose a toast to Harry.
sentences.chinese: 請大家聽我說，我提議大家爲哈利乾杯。

sentences.english: I wish to propose a toast to our friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我建議爲我們的友誼乾杯。

sentences.english: It's considered impolite to clink glasses unless you say "cheers".
sentences.chinese: 碰杯被認爲是不禮貌的，除非當你說“乾杯”時。

sentences.english: Let's drink to the success of your school.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們爲你校的成功乾杯。

sentences.english: Prepare to raise your glass to some cheering news.
sentences.chinese: 準備好爲一些令人歡呼的消息乾杯吧。

sentences.english: "Maybe, what if we do a toast, " said Rick holding his wineglass high.
sentences.chinese: “也許吧，我們乾杯怎麼樣？”瑞克高舉酒杯。

definition: final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
to cook on a skewer/barbecued food on a skewer/shish kebab/(fig.) to perform or play songs in sequence/sequence of songs/medley
(Tw) excuse me/to be sorry/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [pháinn-sè]
variant of 嘗|尝[chang2]/to taste/to experience
stir-fried pork, favorite of Northern Song writer Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼, a.k.a. Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
